mapper.insert: insert into seeot_review(memberId, reviewContent, productNo, reviewFile,reviewStar) values(#{memberId}, #{reviewContent} ,#{productNo},#{reviewFile},#{reviewStar})
mapper.select: select * from seeot_review where productNo=#{productNo} order by reviewDate desc
select * from seeot_review where productNo=#{productNo} order by reviewDate desc
select count(*) from seeot_review where productNo=#{productNo}
select B.* from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from seeot_review where productNo=#{productNo} order by reviewDate desc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
mapper.insert: insert into seeot_review(memberId, reviewContent, productNo, reviewFile, reviewStar, reviewNo) values(#{memberId},#{reviewContent},#{productNo},#{reviewFile},#{reviewStar}, reviewNo.nextval)
mapper.update: update seeot_review set reviewContent=#{reviewContent}, reviewFile=#{reviewFile}, reviewStar=#{reviewStar} where reviewNo=#{reviewNo}
